```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r load_library}
library(homelocator)
```

```{r load_data}
df <- read_csv("/Users/qingqing/Dropbox/SUTD/Ate/homelocator/data/lexington-with-GEOID-2012-2017.csv") 
df <- df %>% select(c(id, u_id, created_at, GEOID))
head(df)
```

```{r data_filtering}
df_filtered <- df %>% homeloc_filter()
head(df_filtered)
```

```{r data_valuate}
df_valuate <- df_filtered %>% homeloc_valuate()
```

```{r data_score}
df_score <- df_valuate %>% homeloc_score()
```

```{r home_extract}
home_loc <- df_score %>% homeloc_extract()
head(home_loc)
write_csv(home_loc, path = "result_qingqing.csv")
```
